text:
@WhiteHouse 1. We have barely tested 2% of Americans 

2. We aren't even 5% of the world population; yet we have almost 25% of all Covid19 cases, and about 1/3 of all cases

3. 44 other countries acted on travel before we did

4. Where are all these drive through testing sites Trump promised
